name: 托马斯·爱迪生
bio_short: 美国发明家和商人，被誉为“门洛帕克的奇才”。他发明了留声机（`edison_phonograph_1877`）、实用的白炽灯泡（`edison_light_bulb_1879`）、电影摄影机（`edison_kinetoscope_1891`）和第一个配电系统（`edison_pearl_street_1882`）。
bio_short_en: An American inventor and businessman, the 'Wizard of Menlo Park'. He invented the phonograph (`edison_phonograph_1877`), the practical incandescent light bulb (`edison_light_bulb_1879`), the motion picture camera (`edison_kinetoscope_1891`), and the first electrical distribution system (`edison_pearl_street_1882`).
